      • getMove

        public GameMove getMove(GameState game,
                        java.lang.String lastMove)
        Description copied from class: GamePlayer
        Produces the player's move, given the current state of the game. This function must return a value within the time alloted by the game timing parameters.
        Specified by:
        getMove in class GamePlayer
        Parameters:
        game - Current state of the game
        lastMove - Opponent's last move. "--" if it is game's first move.
        Returns:
        Player's move
